forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming foggy and damp after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening. Fog developing late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 47F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 54F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with winds diminishing later in the day. High 56F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
